short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your office calls easily and never miss a call from your ESI eSIP system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ESI eSIP Click-to-Call for Chrome integrates with eSIP E-Series services to create a simple yet powerful browser-based dialing tool, enabling your to maximize your workday efficiency.

*Features*

● Incoming call pop-up even with your web browser or eSIP web client closed.
● Dial Pad and PBX-integrated contact search & auto-matching
● Active call control: web-based audio/video calls, call transfer, hold, mute, record, CTI, etc.
● Click-to-dial phone numbers available on any web pages and web-based CRMs
● Notifications for new voicemails and missed calls
● Extension Presence status: Available, Away, Do Not Disturb, etc.
● Queue agent pause/unpause, log in/log out
● Blocklist some websites to prevent the extension from detecting the numbers

*Important Notes*

This extension is only for use with eSIP E-Series phone system and is not a standalone extension. 
● You must have a eSIP Web Client account to use the plugin. 
● If used with eSIP Web Client, this extension will support all the features.
● If used with eSIP Desktop Client, this extension will only support click-to-call, phone number auto-detection on web pages, and website blocklist features.
.
long.zh_CN:
This browser extension allows users to initiate outgoing calls by clicking directly on phone numbers found in emails, websites, and most web-based CRMs.

Our efficient number tagging system identifies phone numbers located in multiple areas of your browser - whether it is a number located in an email signature or even your web searches for pizza delivery for your company party!  This tagging system makes connecting to your destination as easy as a click of the mouse.  Compared to other click-to-call products available today, ESI's tagging system outshines the others by identifying more correct phone numbers, while ignoring more incorrect ones.

As part of ESI Click-to-Call, users receive a screen pop notification that shows on your web browser and/or your main computer desktop.  We've all had those moments where we've forgotten that we turned our ringer volume down, or couldn't hear the phone ringing because we were using headphones, and this visual screen pop feature means that you won't miss that next important call while you're sitting at your computer.

NOTE:
-You must have an active extension on the eSIP PBX.
